long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have created an SEO toolkit Chrome extension where we have currently implemented 3 functionalities.

SEOHub - Chrome Extension Documentation
Welcome to the official documentation for the SEOHub Chrome extension. This guide will help you get started with using the extension and make the most out of its features.

Overview
SEOHub is a comprehensive SEO toolkit designed to help you optimize your website and track its performance across various metrics. With SEOHub, you can check backlinks, monitor search rankings, and find local business listings, all from your browser.

Features
1. Backlink Checker
The Backlink Checker tool helps you verify the presence and quality of backlinks to your domain on a list of URLs, so that you don't have to manually check them. To use it, enter the domain name you want to check, provide a list of backlink URLs, and click "Scan" to start the process. Once the scan is complete, you can view the results on the next screen. The output includes a list of URLs where your domain is referenced, the anchor text, backlink status, dofollow/nofollow status, and any rel information. This report allows you to evaluate the effectiveness of your backlinks and optimize your SEO strategy. Additionally, you can export the results to a CSV file for further analysis and record-keeping. Simply click the "Export Result to CSV" button after the scan is complete to download the file containing all the backlink data.

How it works:
Enter the domain name you want to check.
Provide a list of backlink URLs.
SEOHub will scan each backlink URL to check for the presence of the domain link.

Steps:
Add the domain name and a list of reference backlink URLs.
Click on "Scan" to start the process.
View the results on the next screen after the scan is complete.

Output:
List of URLs
Anchor text
Backlink status
Dofollow/Nofollow status
Rel information

2. Search Ranking Checker
The Search Ranking Checker tool helps you track your domain's search engine ranking for specific keywords automatically so that you don't have to go through each search result for each keyword. To use it, enter the domain name and a list of keywords (up to a maximum of 20 for errorless results), then click "Search" to start the process. SEOHub will search for the keywords on Google and Bing. Once the search is complete, you can view the results on the next screen. The output includes the keywords, positions on Google, actual Google URL, search page Google link, positions on Bing, actual Bing URL, and search page Bing link. This report helps you monitor your search engine performance and optimize your SEO strategy.

How it works:
Enter the domain name and a list of keywords.
SEOHub will search for the keywords on Google and Bing.

Steps:
Add the domain name and a list of keywords.
Click on "Search" to start the process.
View the results on the next screen.

Output:
Keywords
Positions on Google
Actual Google URL
Search page Google link
Positions on Bing
Actual Bing URL
Search page Bing link

3. Local Business Listing

How it works:
Enter your business name, keywords, and location.
SEOHub will search for local business listings based on the provided information.

Steps:
Add your business name, relevant keywords, and location.
Click on "Search" to start the process.
View the results on the next screen.

Output:
Keyword
Position
Search page link for the particular business name

Installation
To install the SEOHub extension:
Go to the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "SEOHub".
Click on "Add to Chrome".
Confirm the installation by clicking "Add extension".
Support

For support or any queries, please contact us at www.ablion.com

Feedback
We would love to hear your feedback! Please leave a review on the Chrome Web Store or contact us directly with your suggestions.

Thank you for choosing SEOHub. We hope our tool helps you achieve your SEO goals effortlessly!
